meanings.sent1: I love shopping for cheapies at the dollar store.
meanings.sent2: She always buys her clothes from the discount rack, looking for cheapies.
meanings.sent3: The party favors were just cheapies, but they brought big smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of cheapies was like a treasure trove of hidden gems.
meanings.sent5: The market was filled with colorful cheapies, each one more tempting than the last.

meanings.definition: A person who is unwilling to spend money.
meanings.sent1: My friend is such a cheapies, always looking for ways to save a few bucks.
meanings.sent2: The cheapies in our group never wants to go out for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cheapies refused to buy a new umbrella, insisting on using a broken one instead.
meanings.sent4: He was a true cheapies, holding onto his money like it was gold.
meanings.sent5: The cheapies was known for always finding the best deals and discounts.
